Now 🎯

This is a now page, and if you have a site, you should write one, too.

Academics 📚

Here's a list of the AP classes I'm taking right now:

  • AP Physics C: E&M
  • AP Physics C: Mechanics
  • AP Biology
  • AP World History: Modern
  • AP Calculus BC

E&M is definitely the hardest, but also the most intriguing for me.

Extracurriculars 🎓

There's an upcoming Scioly invitational, which I plan to sweep with 🥇. I've been studying for the USAPhO recently, and also expect to sweep the actual exam.

Athletics 🏋️‍♂️

I just got finished with wrestling, so I'm trying to get back into the powerlifting mindset and (hopefully) hit a 275lb bench before Feb 1st (my 15th birthday).

I think I'll compete once I can secure a national record, which will probably be the bench record (currently 314lb). I already break the state-level bench and squat records, but I see no reason to compete until I get closer to my 16th birthday.

Doing ⌨️

Currently just trying to juggle everything at once. But I'm thinking about learning Rust and trying to build some app with Rust frameworks for the sake of learning.
